title: If We Don't Fix Sensemaking, We Won't Survive
description:
Why is Sensemaking broken? What would it mean to fix it, and how might we go about it?

This is a short film based on Rebel Wisdom's 'The War on Sensemaking V' with Daniel Schmachtenberger: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0v5RiMdSqwk&t=453s

Rebel Wisdom is running the spring cohort of our online course, Sensemaking 101, starting in February: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/courses

Film produced and edited by Lorcan McSharp.
